txt.en: As a Mariner, Might increases your Physical Mastery, Outgoing Healing, Critical Rating, Finesse, and Parry Rating.
As a Mariner, Fate increases your Max Power and Out of Combat Power Regen.
As a Mariner, Will increases your Physical Mastery, Outgoing Healing, Finesse, Physical Mitigation, Resistance, and Critical Rating.
As a Mariner, Vitality increases your Maximum Morale and Morale Regen.
As a Mariner, Agility increases your Physical Mastery, Outgoing Healing, Parry Rating, Critical Rating, Physical Mitigation, and Tactical Mitigation.

• Class Difficulty: Advanced
  • Role: Offence/Support
  • Gameplay: Mariners are confident melee fighters who wield swords deftly to challenge the forces of evil. Mariners have an innate sense of the flow of combat, and use their balance to adjust their fighting style to best fit the moment. Mariners also know how to use combinations of individual movements to create powerful skill chains. In fellowships, Mariners can use shanties to coordinate and motivate their allies, as well as craft strange concoctions to confound and disrupt foes.
  • Lore: Mariners are resourceful combatants, capable of using strange devices as well as their surroundings to aid them in battle. This class is inspired by EÃ¤rendil, who alone among men successfully sailed to the Uttermost West to plead for the aid of the Valar.
